title: Triumph International
summary: Triumph International is a Swiss underwear manufacturer founded in 1886 in Heubach, Germany. The company's headquarters has been located in Bad Zurzach, Switzerland, since 1977,[3] and it has branches in 45 countries.[4] In addition to the Triumph brand, the company produces and distributes the products under the brands sloggi and AMOâ€™s Style by Triumph.
